title: Java Developer
requiredSkills: Strong analytical, design, programming, and deployment skills for applications and software services; Proactive in learning and implementing new technologies; Open to changes or completely redoing projects when required; Teamwork skills and ability to read and understand English technical documents;
keySkills: Java, Spring Boot, RESTful APIs, SQL, Teamwork
experience: 3 years of experience in software system development; Preferably experienced in the insurance sector or involved in programming system projects in the insurance field; Experience in project-based work, especially with Big Data, Data Analytics, OCR, AI projects is a plus;
qualification: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology (IT) or related fields;
